verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Samuel, <WH8050> "How long will you mourn <WH56> for Saul, <WH7586> since I have rejected <WH3988> him from being king <WH4427> over Israel? <WH3478> Fill <WH4390> your horn <WH7161> with oil, <WH8081> and go. <WH3212> I will send <WH7971> you to Jesse <WH3448> the Bethlehemite; <WH1022> for I have provided <WH7200> a king <WH4428> for myself among his sons. <WH1121>"

Samuel <WH8050> said, <WH559> "How can I go? <WH3212> If Saul <WH7586> hears <WH8085> it, <WH2026> he will kill me. <WH3068>" Yahweh said, <WH559> "Take <WH3947> a heifer <WH1241> with you, <WH3027> and say, <WH559> I have come <WH935> to sacrifice <WH2076> to Yahweh. <WH3068>
Call <WH7121> Jesse <WH3448> to the sacrifice, <WH2077> and I will show <WH3045> you what you shall do. <WH6213> You shall anoint <WH4886> to me him whom I name to you. <WH559>"

Samuel <WH8050> did <WH6213> that which Yahweh <WH3068> spoke, <WH1696> and came <WH935> to Bethlehem. <WH1035> The elders <WH2205> of the city <WH5892> came <WH7125> to meet him trembling, <WH2729> and said, <WH559> "Do you come <WH935> peaceably? <WH7965>"

He said, <WH559> "Peaceably; <WH7965> I have come <WH935> to sacrifice <WH2076> to Yahweh. <WH3068> Sanctify <WH6942> yourselves, <WH935> and come with me to the sacrifice. <WH2077>" He sanctified <WH6942> Jesse <WH3448> and his sons, <WH1121> and called <WH7121> them to the sacrifice. <WH2077>
It happened, <WH935> when they had come, that he looked <WH7200> at Eliab, <WH446> and said, <WH559> "Surely Yahweh <WH3068>'s anointed is before him. <WH4899>"

But Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Samuel, <WH8050> "Don't <WH5027> look on his face, <WH4758> or on the height <WH1364> of his stature; <WH6967> because I have rejected <WH3988> him: <WH120> for I see not as man sees; <WH7200> for man <WH120> looks <WH7200> at the outward appearance, <WH5869> but Yahweh <WH3068> looks <WH7200> at the heart. <WH3824>"
Then Jesse <WH3448> called <WH7121> Abinadab, <WH41> and made him pass <WH5674> before <WH6440> Samuel. <WH8050> He said, <WH559> "Neither has Yahweh <WH3068> chosen this one. <WH977>"
Then Jesse <WH3448> made Shammah <WH8048> to pass by. <WH5674> He said, <WH559> "Neither has Yahweh <WH3068> chosen this one. <WH977>"

Jesse <WH3448> made seven <WH7651> of his sons <WH1121> to pass <WH5674> before <WH6440> Samuel. <WH8050> Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> to Jesse, <WH3448> "Yahweh <WH3068> has not chosen these. <WH977>"

Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> to Jesse, <WH3448> "Are all <WH8552> your children <WH5288> here? <WH559>" He said, "There remains <WH7604> yet the youngest, <WH6996> and behold, <WH7462> he is keeping the sheep. <WH6629>" Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> to Jesse, <WH3448> "Send <WH7971> and get <WH3947> him; <WH5437> for we will not sit down until he comes <WH935> here. <WH6311>"

He sent, <WH7971> and brought him in. <WH935> Now he was ruddy, <WH132> and withal <WH5973> of a beautiful <WH3303> face, <WH5869> and goodly <WH2896> to <WH7210> look on. <WH3068> Yahweh said, <WH559> "Arise, <WH6965> anoint him; <WH4886> for this is he."

Then Samuel <WH8050> took <WH3947> the horn <WH7161> of oil, <WH8081> and anointed <WH4886> him in the midst <WH7130> of his brothers: <WH251> and the Spirit <WH7307> of Yahweh <WH3068> came <WH6743> mightily on David <WH1732> from that day <WH3117> forward. <WH4605> So Samuel <WH8050> rose up, <WH6965> and went <WH3212> to Ramah. <WH7414>
Now the Spirit <WH7307> of Yahweh <WH3068> departed <WH5493> from Saul, <WH7586> and an evil <WH7451> spirit <WH7307> from Yahweh <WH3068> troubled him. <WH1204>
Saul <WH7586>'s servants <WH5650> said <WH559> to him, <WH7451> "See now, an evil spirit <WH7307> from God <WH430> troubles you. <WH1204>

Let our lord <WH113> now command <WH559> your servants <WH5650> who are before <WH6440> you, <WH1245> to seek out a man <WH376> who is a skillful <WH3045> player <WH5059> on the harp. <WH3658> It shall happen, <WH7451> when the evil spirit <WH7307> from God <WH430> is on you, <WH5059> that he shall play with his hand, <WH3027> and you shall be well. <WH2895>"
Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> to his servants, <WH5650> "Provide <WH7200> me now a man <WH376> who can play <WH5059> well, <WH3190> and bring him to me. <WH935>"

Then one <WH259> of the young men answered, <WH6030> and said, <WH559> "Behold, <WH7200> I have seen a son <WH1121> of Jesse <WH3448> the Bethlehemite, <WH1022> who is skillful <WH3045> in playing, <WH5059> a mighty <WH1368> man <WH2428> of valor, <WH4421> a man <WH376> of war, <WH4421> prudent <WH995> in speech, <WH1697> and a comely <WH8389> person; <WH376> and Yahweh is with him. <WH3068>"
Therefore Saul <WH7586> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> to Jesse, <WH3448> and said, <WH559> "Send <WH7971> me David <WH1732> your son, <WH1121> who is with the sheep. <WH6629>"

Jesse <WH3448> took <WH3947> a donkey <WH2543> loaded with bread, <WH3899> and a bottle <WH4997> of wine, <WH3196> and a <WH259> young goat, <WH1423> and sent <WH7971> them by <WH3027> David <WH1732> his son <WH1121> to Saul. <WH7586>
David <WH1732> came <WH935> to Saul, <WH7586> and stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> him. <WH157> He loved him greatly; <WH3966> and he became his armor bearer. <WH5375>
Saul <WH7586> sent <WH7971> to Jesse, <WH3448> saying, <WH559> "Please let David <WH1732> stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> me; <WH4672> for he has found favor <WH2580> in my sight. <WH5869>"

It happened, <WH7307> when the spirit from God <WH430> was on Saul, <WH7586> that David <WH1732> took <WH3947> the harp, <WH3658> and played <WH5059> with his hand: <WH3027> so Saul <WH7586> was refreshed, <WH7304> and was well, <WH2895> and the evil <WH7451> spirit <WH7307> departed from him. <WH5493>
